00031 class NormalEstimation {

00046         INearestPoint3DNeighbor *nnSearchMethod;

00049                 this->vpx = 0;
00050                 this->vpy = 0;

00108         inline void
00109         compute4DCentroid (PointCloud3D *cloud,Eigen::Vector4d &centroid)
00110         {
00111                 // Initialize to 0
00112                 centroid.setZero ();
00113 
00114                 // For each point in the cloud
00115                 int cp = 0;
00116                 for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize(); ++i)
00117                 {
00118                         // Check if the point is invalid
00119                         if (isnan ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX()) || isnan ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY())
00120                                         || isnan ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ()))
00121                                 continue;
00122 
00123                         double x = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00124                         centroid += Eigen::Vector4d::MapAligned (&x);
00125                         cp++;
00126                 }
00127                 centroid /= cp;
00128         }
00129

00161         void
00162         computeFeature (NormalSet3D *normalSet)
00163         {
00164                 // Allocate enough space to hold the results
00165                 // \note This resize is irrelevant for a radiusSearch ().
00166                 //using the default number of nearrest-neighbours used.
00167                 //ToDo enable configuration of 'k'
00168                 std::vector<int> nn_indices;
00169 //              nn_indices.resize(k_neighbours);
00170                 double curvature;
00171                 // Iterating over the entire index vector
00172                 nnSearchMethod->setData(this->inputPointCloud);
00173 
00174 //              std::vector<Point3D>* points;
00175 //              points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00176 
00177                 for (size_t idx = 0; idx < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++idx)
00178                 {
00179 
00180                         nnSearchMethod->findNearestNeighbors(&(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[idx], &nn_indices, k_neighbours);
00181 
00182                         if (nn_indices.size()==0)
00183                         {
00184                                 normalSet->getNormals()->data()[idx].setX(std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00185                                 normalSet->getNormals()->data()[idx].setY(std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00186                                 normalSet->getNormals()->data()[idx].setZ(std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00187                                 curvature = 0;
00188                                 continue;
00189                         }
00190 
00191                         double nx,ny,nz;
00192                         computePointNormal (this->inputPointCloud, nn_indices,
00193                                         nx,ny,nz,curvature);
00194 
00195                         Normal3D tempNormal;
00196                         tempNormal.setX(nx);
00197                         tempNormal.setY(ny);
00198                         tempNormal.setZ(nz);
00199 
00200                         normalSet->addNormal(tempNormal);
00201                         flipNormalTowardsViewpoint ((*this->inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[idx], vpx, vpy, vpz,
00202                                         normalSet->getNormals()->data()[idx]);
00203 
00204                 }
00205         }
00206 
00214         inline void
00215             flipNormalTowardsViewpoint (Point3D &point, double vp_x, double vp_y, double vp_z, Normal3D &normal)
00216           {
00217             // See if we need to flip any plane normals
00218             vp_x -= point.getX();
00219             vp_y -= point.getY();
00220             vp_z -= point.getZ();
00221 
00222             // Dot product between the (viewpoint - point) and the plane normal
00223             double cos_theta = (vp_x * normal.getX() + vp_y * normal.getY() + vp_z * normal.getZ());
00224 
00225             // Flip the plane normal
00226             if (cos_theta < 0)
00227             {
00228               normal.setX(-1*normal.getX());
00229               normal.setY(-1*normal.getY());
00230               normal.setZ(-1*normal.getZ());
00231               // Hessian form (D = nc . p_plane (centroid here) + p)
00232               normal.setZ(-1 * (
00233                           normal.getX() * point.getX() +
00234                           normal.getY() * point.getY() +
00235                           normal.getZ() * point.getZ()));
00236             }
00237           }
00238 
00239 };
00240 
00241 }
